    â–€ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–„  â–„      â–„ â–„â–ˆâ–€    â–€â–ˆâ–€     â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–€ â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–€     â–€â–ˆâ–€    â–€â–ˆâ–„ â–„      â–„  â–„â–ˆâ–ˆ â–€
      â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€        â–€â–€         â–€                 â–€         â–€â–€        â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€
      
  
      Stuck deep in the Congo jungle, you and your teammates  are  hunted
      by packs of demons lurking  in the  darkest areas.  Light  is  your
      friend in this hostile environment. Scavenge equipment  and utilize
      good teamwork to secure your route of escape in this top-down co-op
      horror action game. The jungle is full of surprises. As you explore
      towns, rivers, caves and more it is essential that you keep a close
      eye on your surroundings  for the  demons that  are  stalking  your
      every move, waiting for the ideal opportunity to take you  out  for
      good.

      For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/317530/
